trans-unit.source: Create a virtual network using an ARM template | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Create a virtual network using an ARM template | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Learn how to create a virtual network using an ARM template | Resource Manager.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to create a virtual network using an ARM template | Resource Manager.

trans-unit.source: Create a virtual network by using an ARM template
trans-unit.target: Create a virtual network by using an ARM template

trans-unit.source: This document covers creating a VNet by using the Resource Manager deployment model.
trans-unit.target: This document covers creating a VNet by using the Resource Manager deployment model.

trans-unit.source: You can also [create a virtual network in the classic deployment model](virtual-networks-create-vnet-classic-pportal.md).
trans-unit.target: You can also [create a virtual network in the classic deployment model](virtual-networks-create-vnet-classic-pportal.md).

trans-unit.source: You will learn how to download and modify and existing ARM template from GitHub, and deploy the template from GitHub, PowerShell, and the Azure CLI.
trans-unit.target: You will learn how to download and modify and existing ARM template from GitHub, and deploy the template from GitHub, PowerShell, and the Azure CLI.

trans-unit.source: If you are simply deploying the ARM template directly from GitHub, without any changes, skip to [deploy a template from github](#deploy-the-arm-template-by-using-click-to-deploy).
trans-unit.target: If you are simply deploying the ARM template directly from GitHub, without any changes, skip to [deploy a template from github](#deploy-the-arm-template-by-using-click-to-deploy).
